creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: extremely long blue denim ties on 57" embroidered band with center red floral embroidery with metallic trim and green silk and white cotton borders; lower part is bordered with lavender, blue, white and green; floral center is embroidered in cross chains and plain stitch with French knots in red, green and purple; lined in blue denim
dimension:
21 1/4 x 57 in. (53.98 x 144.78 cm)
58 in. (147.32 cm) (object part, ties, approx.)
title: Baby Carrier
